params._silo: Silo address from which to read data
params._users: array of users for witch we want to get liquidation data

returns.assets: array of all processed assets (collateral + debt, including removed)
returns.receivedCollaterals: receivedCollaterals[userId][assetId] => amount amounts of collaterals send to `_flashReceiver`
returns.shareAmountsToRepay: shareAmountsToRepaid[userId][assetId] => amount required amounts of debt to be repaid

params._silo: Silo address from which to read data
params._timestampOffset: offset to reduce current timestamp while doing calculation for interest
